name: Tiny Car Racing City Champions
description:
Mini Cars enthusiast? Get here wide city roads with mini cars. With this game you get tiny cars to race, collect coins , be the champion of these mini cars. Wide city
roads to drive with lightning speeds but with in this lightning racing dont forget to collect hourglass timers with coins. the more hourglass timers you get, more time
you have to collect treasures to unlock next high levels.
Cars are tiny but have potential of racing endlessly, Use this potential in pursuit of treasure to unlock variety of cars. You need to enthusiast, you need endurance and real car skills to driver and race with cars.
-> Small tiny cars in this mini game
-> beautiful City racing roads
-> more coins you collect, more variety of cars you unlock
-> Number of levels to test your driving potential
-> Real treasure hunting pursuit

This game supports ads.
